title: please recommend a compatible gimbal for pixel 4a 5g
content:
hi friends
i want to buy a gimbal for my phone looks like good ones are dji osmo mobile 3 and zhiyun smooth 4 considering my budget. 
but are they compatible with 4a 5g? 
there are a lot of complaints about connectivity issues between android app and gimbal.

do you have any other suggestions? tnx
